[Groovy] Class ProcessWorklistService

java.lang.Object
  ProcessWorklistService

class ProcessWorklistService

Process Worklist service provides Process list and worklist filtered by process types, users, variables, etc.

Authors:
July Karpey
Maria Voitovich

Method Detail

getProcessList

java.lang.Object getProcessList(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String statusID, java.lang.String username, Date startedFrom, Date finishedFrom, Map variablesFilter, java.lang.String sortBy, java.lang.String ascending, java.lang.Integer maxResult, java.lang.Integer offset)
Finds processes and theirs nodes according to authorities, statuses and variable filter.
Parameters:
type
status
username
startedFrom
finishedFrom
variablesFilter - (varName : set of varValues)
sortBy - - processNode field or process variable value if sortBy="var."
ascending
maxResult - - to restrict the maximum size of the list
offset - - for paging
Returns:
list of processes according to filters

java.lang.Object getProcessList(ProcessSearchParameters searchParameters)

getProcessListSize

java.lang.Integer getProcessListSize(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String statusID, java.lang.String username, Date startedFrom, Date finishedFrom, Map variablesFilter)
Finds size of process list according to conditions and variable filter.
Parameters:
type
status
username
startedFrom
finishedFrom
variablesFilter - (varName : set of varValues)
Returns:
size of process list of processes according to filters

getProcessListSize

getWorklist

List getWorklist(List authorities, Map variablesFilter, java.lang.String sortBy, java.lang.String ascending, java.lang.Integer maxResult, java.lang.Integer offset)
Searching for all open process nodes that are available for the requester
Parameters:
authorities - (assignees)
variablesFilter - (varName, set of varValues)
sortBy - - processNode field
ascending
maxResult - - to restrict the maximum size of the list
offset - - for paging
Returns:
list of open nodes according to node authorities and filters

getWorklistSize

java.lang.Integer getWorklistSize(List authorities, Map variablesFilter)
Searching for count of all open process nodes that are available for the requester
Parameters:
authorities - (assignees)
variablesFilter - (varName, set of varValues)
sortBy - - processNode field
ascending
Returns:
list of open nodes according to node authorities and filters
